citations.narrative:
There is a refridgerator that contains meat(Chicken,fish,mice) and other food items used for the regulated animals that
have a buildup of old blood or dirt/debris on several shelf/wall surfaces. The freezer of this refridgerator and a stand up
freezer have been filled to capacity with frost, food and nonfood products. Both freezers need to be defrosted and cleaned
with the non-eatable items removed and all contents cleaned and checked for deterioration.
The buildup of old blood/liquids from thawing food items can cause contamination or spoilage of the food products for the
regulated animals. The buildup of frost and over packing of the freezers can cause the food items to not freeze completely
or fast enough to prevent the buildup of bacteria in the food items which could cause possible health issues if eaten by the
regulated animals. A regular cleaning and defrosting should be done on all food storage refridgerators/freezers.
Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration,
molding, or contamination by vermin.
To be corrected by: January 21, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a refridgerator that contains meat(Chicken,fish,mice) and other food items used for the regulated animals that 
have a buildup of old blood or dirt/debris on several shelf/wall surfaces. The freezer of this refridgerator and a stand up 
freezer have been filled to capacity with frost, food and nonfood products. Both freezers need to be defrosted and cleaned 
with the non-eatable items removed and all contents cleaned and checked for deterioration.  
 
The buildup of old blood/liquids from thawing food items can cause contamination or spoilage of the food products for the 
regulated animals. The buildup of frost and over packing of the freezers can cause the food items to not freeze completely 
or fast enough to prevent the buildup of bacteria in the food items which could cause possible health issues if eaten by the 
regulated animals. A regular cleaning and defrosting should be done on all food storage refridgerators/freezers. 
 
 Supplies of food and bedding shall be stored in facilities which adequately protect such supplies against deterioration, 
molding, or contamination by vermin. 
 
To be corrected by: January 21, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
